name: ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y build-essential libicu-dev libmagic-dev cmake pkg-config libssl-dev && git config --global --add safe.directory ${containerWorkspaceFolder}
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'gem install bundler && bundle config set --local path "vendor/bundle" && if [ -f Gemfile ] && [ ! -f Gemfile.lock ]; then echo "No Gemfile.lock found, generating it..." && (bundle install || (gem install workato-sdk workato-connector-sdk && gem install charlock_holmes -v "~> 0.7.7" && bundle install)) && echo "Gemfile.lock generated successfully"; elif [ -f Gemfile.lock ]; then echo "Gemfile.lock exists, running bundle install..." && bundle install; fi'
postAttachCommand: bash -c 'if [ -f Gemfile ] && [ ! -f Gemfile.lock ]; then echo "Warning: Gemfile.lock still missing, attempting to create..." && bundle install; fi && ([ -f bin/dev ] && bin/dev || [ -f config.ru ] && bundle exec rails server -b 0.0.0.0 || true)'
